    Getting and setting map attributes

    getting-and-setting-map-attributes.Rmd

    Once you have a map data object after either making a map or loading a map you will want to be able to access and manipulate map properties.

    General map attributes

    Function Description
    titerTable() The titer table
    agCoords() Antigen coordinates
    srCoords() Serum coordinates
    name() Map name
    titerTableLayers() Titer measurement data

    Antigen and sera attributes

    Antigens

    Function Description
    agNames() Antigen names
    agIDs() Antigen IDs
    agGroups() Antigen groups
    agNamesFull() Full antigen names
    agNamesAbbreviated() Abbreviated antigen names
    agDates() Antigen dates
    agReference() Is antigen a reference virus

    Sera

    Function Description
    srNames() Sera names
    srIDs() Sera IDs
    srGroups() Sera groups
    srNamesFull() Full sera names
    srNamesAbbreviated() Abbreviated sera names

    Attributes related to plotting

    Antigens Sera Description
    agShown() srShown() Point shown
    agSize() srSize() Point size
    agFill() srFill() Point fill color
    agOutline() srOutline() Point outline color
    agOutlineWidth() srOutlineWidth() Point outline width
    agRotation() srRotation() Point rotation
    agAspect() srAspect() Point aspect
    agShape() srShape() Point shape
    agDrawingOrder() srDrawingOrder() Point drawing order

    Attributes related to optimization runs

    Function Description
    selectedOptimization() The selected optimization number
    agBaseCoords() Antigen base coordinates
    srBaseCoords() Sera base coordinates
    mapComment() Map comment
    minColBasis() Map minimum column bases
    mapDimensions() Number of map dimensions
    mapTransformation() Map transformation
    mapTranslation() Map translation
    mapStress() Map stress
    colBases() Map column bases

    Contents

    • Antigen and sera attributes
